title: Hits all of your emotions!!
review: Just love this film! Soo unique, funny, warm and deep. The characters really pulled me in and did such a great job of relating all the emotions they were going thru. It was beautifully written, acted and directed and highly recommend watching this movie!!! BRAVO to the entire cast, crew and writer!!!!!

title: Quirky and fun, thoughtful and heart wrenching...
review: Some books, songs or movies come just when you need them. Wake. is that movie for me. Touching and warm, offbeat and just a delight! Kudos to this whole crew for bringing this flick together! Love love loved it!!!

title: Sweet, quirky, poignant film
review: Lovely film about the nature of grief and how to forgive ourselves when tragedy strikes and learn to live again. Strong cast with a Stand out performance by Paige Searcy as the daughter, Sam. I love the writers dialogue as it resonates as honest and true.
